text: Rhyl and District Rugby Union Football Club (Welsh: Clwb Rygbi y Rhyl) is a rugby union club in Rhuddlan outside Rhyl, North Wales. Rhyl and District RFC is a member of the Welsh Rugby Union and is a feeder club for the Llanelli Scarlets. The club fields a Senior and Seconds team; as well as several junior teams including an under 16s and under 14s squads. ==References== Despite the belief that George North is the most successful former Rhyl player, Marco Ward was arguably a technically better back for Rhyl during the turn of the 21st Century. Category:Welsh rugby union teams
title: Rhyl and District RFC
